spell_list.description: Instantly removes the sickness effects of a resurrection spell from an ally and cures them of any Fear effects.  Confront Fear also greatly speeds their regeneration if they were under resurrection sickness from the effects of a resurrection spell.  Has no effect on revived sickness.
spell_list.description_pvp: Instantly removes the sickness effects of a resurrection spell from an ally and cures them of any Fear effects.  Confront Fear also greatly speeds their regeneration if they were under resurrection sickness from the effects of a resurrection spell.  Has no effect on revived sickness.

effect_list.description: Dispels 6 levels of hostile Fear effects on target
Increases Combat Mana Regen of target by 50.0%
Target must be under the effects of a Resurrection spell.
Increases Combat HP Regen of target by 50.0%
Target must be under the effects of a Resurrection spell.

spell_list.name: Confront Fear
